short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Awaiting for new viewers on your Google Doc? Save your time, we will do that for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The badge displays the current number of viewers on the opened Google Doc and is updated automatically. It also comes with a notification sound.
